InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

InstalledItem.Name: Omnisky IX Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Amon & Reese Co.
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 3

The Omnisky IX is the size three version of Amon & Reese's popular laser autocannon. The weapon's low rate of fire is offset by its effective range, which allows it to deliver a powerful shot from afar.

InstalledItem.Name: Omnisky IX Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Amon & Reese Co.
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 3

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-313 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 1xS3

Behring’s MSD-313 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of one S3 missile.

InstalledItem.Name: Viper III Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Nova Pyrotechnica
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 3

Nova has worked hard to insure that their infrared tracking Viper strike missile lives up to its name by delivering agile and lethal attacks against hostile targets.

InstalledItem.Name: Pioneer I Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Tracking Signal: Electromagnetic
Size: 1

Behring prides itself on dependability and the Pioneer is no exception. The updated Oracle EM tracking system has proven itself time and again in numerous consumer-testing reports against similarly classed proximity missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: AllStop
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Gorgon Defender Industries first created the AllStop shield generator to hold off the Vanduul. They worked so well that many military crafts were known to prefer the AllStop. Just one of the many reasons to have one on your ship.

InstalledItem.Name: Regulus
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

The Regulus is the power plant you can count on when everyone is counting on you. Made to exceed exacting military standards, Aegis’ design team has made sure that you have the extra power you need, when you need it most.

InstalledItem.Name: Bracer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

For those looking for a solid, dependable mid-line cooler, you can’t do much better than Aegis’ Bracer. This small-frame cooler system offers solid performance and durability to keep your ship firing on all cylinders.
